    Publications

    You can find my articles on my Google Scholar or DBLP.

    Journal Papers

             Distributed Robot Motion Control

    1. Guowen Xu, Hesuan Hu, Yang Liu, Shang-Wei Lin, and Zuohua Ding, “A distributed method to avoid higher-order deadlocks in multi-robot systems.” In Automatica, vol. 112, 2020. (IF: 6.355, Q1)

    2. Guowen Xu, Hesuan Hu, Yang Liu, Shang-Wei Lin, and Zuohua Ding, “A real-time and fully distributed approach to motion planning for multirobot systems.” In IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics: Systems, vol. 49, no. 12 , pp. 2636-2650, 2019. (IF: 5.135, Q1)

    3. Guowen Xu, Hesuan Hu, Yang Liu, Shang-Wei Lin, and Zuohua Ding, “A distributed approach to robust control of multi-robot systems.” In Automatica, vol. 99, pp. 1-13, 2018. (IF: 6.355, Q1)

    4. Guowen Xu, Hesuan Hu, Yang Liu, and Zuohua Ding. “Collision and deadlock avoidance in multirobot systems: A distributed approach.” In IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics: Systems, vol. 47, no. 7, pp. 1712–1726, 2017. (IF: 5.135, Q1)

    5. 周远，胡核算，刘杨，林尚威， “分布式多机器人运动控制的离散事件系统方法.” 《控制理论与应用》，vol. 35, no. 1, pp. 110-120, 2018.

      System Modeling and Analyzing

    6. Zuohua Ding, Guowen Xu, and Mengchu Zhou, “Modeling self-adaptive software systems by fuzzy rules and Petri nets.” In IEEE Transactions on Fuzzy Systems, vol. 26, no. 2, pp. 967-984, 2018. (IF: 8.759, Q1)

    7. Zuohua Ding, Guowen Xu, and MengChu Zhou, “Modeling self-adaptive software systems with learning Petri nets.” In IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics: Systems, vol. 46, no. 4, pp. 483–498, 2016. (IF: 2.35, Q2)

    8. Zuohua Ding, Guowen Xu, Mingyue Jiang, and MengChu Zhou, “A new class of Petri nets for modeling and property verification of switched stochastic systems.” In IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics: Systems, vol. 45, no. 7, pp. 1087–1100, 2015. (IF: 1.598, Q2)

    9. Zuohua Ding, Guowen Xu, and MengChu Zhou, “A polynomial algorithm to performance analysis of concurrent systems via Petri nets and ordinary differential equations.” In IEEE Transactions on Automation Science and Engineering, vol. 12, no. 1, pp. 295–308, 2015. (IF: 2.696, Q1)

    10. Zuohua Ding, Guowen Xu, and MengChu Zhou, “Stability analysis of switched fuzzy systems via model checking.” In IEEE Transactions on Fuzzy Systems, vol. 22, no. 6, pp. 1503-1514, Dec. 2014. (IF: 8.746, Q1)

      System Reliability

    11. Zuohua Ding, Guowen Xu, Geguang Pu, and Mengchu Zhou, “Online failure prediction for railway transportation systems based on Fuzzy rules and data analysis.” In IEEE Transactions on Reliability, vol. 67, no. 3, pp. 1143-1158, 2018. (IF: 2.888, Q1)

    12. Zuohua Ding, Ting Xu, Tiantian Ye, and Guowen Xu, “Online prediction and improvement of reliability for service oriented systems.” In IEEE Transactions on Reliability, vol. 65, no. 3, pp. 1133–1148, 2016. (IF: 2.79, Q1)

    13. 周远，丁佐华，”基于程序不变量计算软件可靠性.”, 《软件学报》， vol. 26, no. 12, pp. 3075-3087, 2015.

    14. 杨晓燕，周远，丁佐华，”基于在线故障定位及自主适应提高软件可靠性.”, 《软件学报》， vol. 26, no. 4, pp. 886-903, 2015.

      Others

    15. Jipeng Wang, Chunrong Pan, Hesuan Hu, Liang Li, and Guowen Xu, “A cyclic scheduling approach to single-arm cluster tools with multiple wafer types and residency time constraints.” In IEEE Transactions on Automation Science and Engineering, vol. 16, no, 3, pp. 1373-1386, 2019. (IF: 5.224, Q1)

    16. 周远，徐映红，徐定华，”结合粒子群算法的一类双层纺织材料厚度设计反问题”, 《纺织学报》，vol. 34, no. 6, pp. 40-45, 2013.

    Conference Papers

             Supervisory Control for Automated Manufacturing Systems

    1. Junyao Hou, Hesuan Hu, Guowen Xu, Yang Liu, “Decentralized supervisory control of generalized mutual exclusion constraints in Petri nets.” In 13th IEEE Conference on Automation Science and Engineering (CASE), 2017: 358-363.

    2. Nan Du, Hesuan Hu, Guowen Xu, Yang Liu, “Robust control of automated manufacturing systems with complex structures using Petri nets.” In 13th IEEE Conference on Automation Science and Engineering (CASE), 2017: 364-369.

    3. Xiaojun Wang, Hesuan Hu, Guowen Xu, Yang Liu. “A robust control approach to automated manufacturing systems allowing failures and reworks with Petri nets.” In 13th IEEE Conference on Automation Science and Engineering (CASE), 2017: 370-375.

    4. Jipeng Wang, Chunrong Pan, Hesuan Hu, Guowen Xu, “Scheduling of single-arm cluster tools with multi-type wafers and shared PMs.” In 13th IEEE Conference on Automation Science and Engineering (CASE), 2017: 1046-1051.

      System Modeling and Analyzing

    5. Mingyue Jiang, Zuohua Ding, MengChu Zhou, Guowen Xu, “Formal modeling and verification of secure mobile agent systems.” In 13th IEEE Conference on Automation Science and Engineering (CASE), 2015: 545-550.

    6. Zuohua Ding, Guowen Xu, MengChu Zhou, “Modeling self-adaptive software systems with learning Petri nets.” Companion Proceedings of the 36th International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE Companion), 2014: 464-467.
